name: The Firelord
description:
The Lord of Fire is a platformer arena that tells of the adventures of a fiery magician. The native kingdom of our heroine was destroyed by a powerful fire mage. You can save the once prosperous kingdom. Challenge the strongest magicians of fire!


  • Intuitive gameplay
  • Many magic skills
  • Development improvements Create your build! [/ h2]

    Choose the right skills for your playing style!
